mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_account (shop_id, account_type, account_name, username, password_encrypted, two_factor_secret, security_question, status, remark, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{accountType}, #{accountName}, #{username}, #{passwordEncrypted}, #{twoFactorSecret}, #{securityQuestion}, #{status}, #{remark}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_account SET account_type = #{accountType}, account_name = #{accountName}, username = #{username}, password_encrypted = #{passwordEncrypted}, two_factor_secret = #{twoFactorSecret}, security_question = #{securityQuestion}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shop_account WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} ORDER BY account_type, created_at
SELECT * FROM shop_account WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND account_type = #{accountType}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_account SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE shop_account SET last_login_at = NOW(), login_fail_count = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE shop_account SET login_fail_count = login_fail_count + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE shop_account SET login_fail_count = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
